EmailTemplate.description: Email used in Lead assignment rule to confirm receipt of TLMA request to the customer
EmailTemplate.name: DPP Nomex® TMLA received confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Nomex® - Trademark Licensee Agreement request received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for having filled in DuPont(TM) Nomex(R) Trademark License Agreement questionnaire, all submitted information have been received successfully.
Your request has been forwarded and we will soon revert to you.
Should you have any question, do not hesitate to contact christel.pavlousek@che.dupont.com
Again thank you for your interest.
Your DuPont(TM) Nomex® Team
